Class Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.marginallyclever.robotOverlord.model.Model
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Model
extends Object
implements Serializable
    contains the vertex, normal, and texture data for a 3D model.
    Author:
    dan royer

        Translate all the vertexes by a given amount

        dz - amount to translate on Z axis
